text: tæthwa brrda phu man nı khwam ru nı hmu phwk khea læa brrda phu thi sraththa nan phwk khea yxm sraththa tx sing thi thuk prathan lng ma kæ cea læa sing thi thuk prathan lng ma kxn cea læa brrda phu thi darng wi sung kar lahmad læa brrda phu chara sa kat læa brrda phu sraththa tx xallxhˌ læa nı wan prlok chn hela ni hæla rea ca hı khea sung rangwal xan hıy hlwng
